alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 10:08PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Allen County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1007 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kincaid, or 14 miles northeast of La Harpe, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mildred. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
